p: COVID-19 pandemic is a global challenge for human health, and researchers are urgently seeking medicine for it. Currently, the treatment options for COVID-19 are limited due to non-availability of vaccines or specific medicines. In this context, the search for traditional herbal medicine is also a viable strategy for COVID-19 management. The present study on selected Ayurveda medicines provided valuable scientific data regarding the active ingredients of the drugs tested with proven therapeutic potentials like anti-viral, immunomodulatory, and anti-inflammatory activities.
